clinical_study.brief_title: Cardiac Function Non-Invasive Monitoring System Evaluation Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Non-significant risk device study to conduct evaluation of the performance of new device for monitoring of cardiac function (based on previous iterations 510(k) 173156)

detailed_description.textblock: Non-significant risk device study to conduct evaluation of the performance of new device for monitoring of cardiac function (based on previous iterations 510(k) 173156)

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac Performance System electronic data for Cardiac Output
primary_outcome.time_frame: 60 minutes during Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedure
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Cardiac Output to report in L/m.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac Performance System electronic data for Pulmonary Artery Pressure
primary_outcome.time_frame: 60 minutes during Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedure
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Pulmonary Artery Pressure to report in mmHg.

primary_outcome.measure: Cardiac Performance System electronic data for Pulmonary Artery Wedge Pressure
primary_outcome.time_frame: 60 minutes during Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedure
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Pulmonary Artery Wedge Pressure to report in mmHg.

primary_outcome.measure: Pulmonary Artery Catheter electronic data for Cardiac Output
primary_outcome.time_frame: 60 minutes during Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedure
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Cardiac Output to report in L/m.

primary_outcome.measure: Pulmonary Artery Catheter electronic data for Pulmonary Artery Pressure
primary_outcome.time_frame: 60 minutes during Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedure
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Pulmonary Artery Pressure to report in mmHg.

primary_outcome.measure: Pulmonary Artery Catheter electronic data for Pulmonary Artery Wedge Pressure
primary_outcome.time_frame: 60 minutes during Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedure
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac function metric measurement including Pulmonary Artery Wedge Pressure to report in mmHg.

primary_outcome.measure: Echocardiography electronic data for Ejection Fraction
primary_outcome.time_frame: 15 minutes at a time prior to or after Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedure
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac function measurement including left ventricle ejection fraction to report in percentage.

arm_group.description: Subjects will wear Cardiac Performance System (CPS) non-invasive device for brief periods during procedures including assessment by Pulmonary Artery Catheter (PAC) methods.

intervention.description: Device: Cardiac Performance System Participants will be asked to wear the Cardiac Performance System, a non-invasive sensor device on their upper abdomen. The Cardiac Performance System monitoring device will continuously monitor cardiac function. The device will be worn at the time when Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedures are conducted.

study_pop.textblock: Patients scheduled for Pulmonary Artery Catheter procedure

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults of age 18 or older
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with wounds or surgical incisions at the site of sensor placement
